# Marrow UI

> A sleek, opinionated UI kit built with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js. No React, no build step required. 59 copy-paste components with a single config file for complete theme control.

Marrow UI uses CSS classes prefixed with `mw-` (e.g., `mw-btn`, `mw-card`, `mw-input`). Interactive components use Alpine.js `x-data` directives. All styling is powered by Tailwind CSS with CSS custom properties for theming.

## Getting Started
- [Introduction](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/introduction): Overview, philosophy, and comparison with shadcn/ui
- [Installation](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/installation): CDN quick start, CLI setup, project configuration
- [Customization](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/customization): Theme config file reference — colors, radius, compactness, fonts, shadows

## CLI
- `npx marrow-ui init` — Scaffold config, CSS, and JS files in your project
- `npx marrow-ui add button card dialog` — Add specific component templates
- `npx marrow-ui add --all` — Add all 59 component templates
- `npx marrow-ui build` — Generate theme CSS from marrow.config.js
- `npx marrow-ui list` — List all available components

## Components
- [Accordion](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/accordion): Collapsible content sections
- [Alert](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/alert): Status messages with variants
- [Alert Dialog](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/alert-dialog): Confirmation modal with actions
- [Aspect Ratio](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/aspect-ratio): Fixed aspect ratio container
- [Avatar](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/avatar): User avatar with image or initials
- [Badge](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/badge): Small status labels
- [Breadcrumb](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/breadcrumb): Navigation path indicator
- [Button](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/button): Primary, secondary, outline, ghost, destructive, link variants
- [Button Group](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/button-group): Grouped button set
- [Calendar](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/calendar): Inline date calendar
- [Card](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/card): Container with header, content, footer
- [Carousel](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/carousel): Slide-based content viewer
- [Chart](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/chart): Data visualization container
- [Checkbox](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/checkbox): Boolean toggle with check mark
- [Collapsible](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/collapsible): Expandable content section
- [Combobox](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/combobox): Searchable select dropdown
- [Command](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/command): Command palette / search interface
- [Context Menu](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/context-menu): Right-click menu
- [Data Table](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/data-table): Full-featured data table
- [Date Picker](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/date-picker): Date selection with calendar popup
- [Dialog](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/dialog): Modal dialog with overlay
- [Direction](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/direction): RTL/LTR direction control
- [Drawer](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/drawer): Slide-out panel from edge
- [Dropdown Menu](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/dropdown-menu): Click-triggered menu
- [Empty](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/empty): Empty state placeholder
- [Field](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/field): Form field wrapper with label and error
- [Hover Card](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/hover-card): Hover-triggered info card
- [Input](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/input): Text input field
- [Input Group](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/input-group): Input with addons
- [Input OTP](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/input-otp): One-time password input
- [Item](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/item): List item with icon and text
- [Kbd](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/kbd): Keyboard shortcut indicator
- [Label](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/label): Form label element
- [Menubar](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/menubar): Horizontal menu bar
- [Native Select](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/native-select): Browser-native select
- [Navigation Menu](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/navigation-menu): Top navigation with dropdowns
- [Pagination](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/pagination): Page navigation controls
- [Popover](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/popover): Floating content panel
- [Progress](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/progress): Progress bar indicator
- [Radio Group](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/radio-group): Single-select option group
- [Resizable](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/resizable): Resizable panel layout
- [Scroll Area](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/scroll-area): Custom scrollbar container
- [Select](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/select): Custom select dropdown
- [Separator](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/separator): Horizontal or vertical divider
- [Sheet](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/sheet): Side panel overlay
- [Sidebar](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/sidebar): Collapsible sidebar navigation
- [Skeleton](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/skeleton): Loading placeholder
- [Slider](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/slider): Range input slider
- [Sonner](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/sonner): Stacked toast notifications
- [Spinner](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/spinner): Loading spinner
- [Switch](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/switch): Toggle switch
- [Table](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/table): Data table
- [Tabs](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/tabs): Tabbed content navigation
- [Textarea](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/textarea): Multi-line text input
- [Toast](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/toast): Notification popup
- [Toggle](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/toggle): Pressable toggle button
- [Toggle Group](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/toggle-group): Multi-toggle selection
- [Tooltip](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/tooltip): Hover tooltip
- [Typography](https://marrow-ui.dev/docs/components/typography): Heading and text styles
